cast.overview: Five grisly tales from a 1950s-style comic, including a murdered father rising from beyond, a bizarre meteor, a vengeful husband, a mysterious crate's occupant, and a plague of cockroaches.
cast.title: Creepshow

details.biography: David Earl Garrison (born June 30, 1952) is an American actor. His primary venue is live theatre, but he is best known as the character Steve Rhoades in the television series, Married... with Children. He also appeared in numerous theatrical plays, particularly that of The Wizard in many tours of the musical, Wicked.
details.name: David Garrison
